name: TheDailyFresh
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to the daily fresh for positive lifestyle ideas that can help you live an extraordinary life in a world full of chaos. You can just say “Alexa, what’s My Daily Fresh” and we’ll share creative reminders of upcoming Valentine’s Day, ideas on how to celebrate National Popcorn Day or even business ideas that can keep your marketing and strategy game top notch. 

Tune into daily for a fresh idea to make everyday amazing!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
